## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [currentDropdownOwner](./blockly.gesture_class.currentdropdownowner_property.md) |  | [Field](./blockly.field_class.md) \| null | The owner of the dropdownDiv when this gesture first starts. Needed because we'll close the dropdown before fields get to act on their events, and some fields care about who owns the dropdown. |
|  [isEnding\_](./blockly.gesture_class.isending__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Boolean used internally to break a cycle in disposal. |
|  [onMoveWrapper\_](./blockly.gesture_class.onmovewrapper__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [browserEvents.Data](./blockly.browserevents_namespace.data_typealias.md) \| null | A handle to use to unbind a pointermove listener at the end of a drag. Opaque data returned from Blockly.bindEventWithChecks\_. |
|  [onUpWrapper\_](./blockly.gesture_class.onupwrapper__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [browserEvents.Data](./blockly.browserevents_namespace.data_typealias.md) \| null | A handle to use to unbind a pointerup listener at the end of a drag. Opaque data returned from Blockly.bindEventWithChecks\_. |
|  [startWorkspace\_](./blockly.gesture_class.startworkspace__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) \| null | The workspace that the gesture started on. There may be multiple workspaces on a page; this is more accurate than using Blockly.common.getMainWorkspace(). |

|  [getCurrentDragger()](./blockly.gesture_class.getcurrentdragger_1_method.md) |  | Gets the current dragger if an item is being dragged. Null if nothing is being dragged. |
